name: Biohack
tagline: The Bio, BioHack, BioLab Equipment Fabrication and Biomaterilas done in BioHack Academy
body:
### Welcome to BioHack Pages.
BioHack 
In this research project we have made our best effort to create open source Bio Lab, which equipped with Biolab equipment and start Bio projects in that lab, some of the devices we have made include : magnetic stirrer, sterile hood, Syringe Pump, Peristaltic Pump, Centrifuge(Bio Centrifuge), Incubator and etc, 
Of the project we have done was growing different bacteria, Cultivating and Isolating Microbes (like leaf, Mycelium,  MG , etc,. ) , make electricity out of nutrient soil, water cleaning Bio Reacotor with Algae, and Designing Microfluidics Chip, 
The Biohack academy itself contains more than just one project itself that could be explained as one research project.
2015
![](http://sasanbahrami.webnode.com/images/200000013-4f642505d5/IMG_5780.jpg)

**Magnetic Stirrer

This was one of the project I really love, since we ourselves have used it a lot, This contain an electronic circuit which contain motor and fan and connected to series of resistors and switches and, as of fabricated with fan, we have connected to magnets on the fan the those causes the moment of rods.


![](http://files.sasanbahrami.webnode.com/200000025-b63deb7393/IMG_5106.jpg)



INCUBATOR
in out Bio Factory wa have made Incubator which contain timing machine designed by electronic components and Arduino and timing module and tempreture sensor, it contain light bulp to make heating and computer fan to make circulation of air, this the hacked version of every normal lab incubator, 

The design has been done by us in Bio lab and we have used sketchup and laser cutter to design although other tools like inkspace has been used and the fabrication made with MDF.

As of usage we have make out bateria growth and cultivation with this incubator, and t was lovely to work with.I


![](http://sasanbahrami.webnode.com/images/200000024-7862179589/incubator-.jpg)

![](http://files.sasanbahrami.webnode.com/200000033-22bbd23b58/Forked-Incubator.jpg)





Centrifuge

This is our centrifuge project which we had made a great effort to make its electronics, 

we have also fabricate it as to parts one of been sides and box which as been design in sketches the laser cut, 

the second import part was its Rotor which has been designed and fabricated with a 3D Printer and there has been second Rotor which has been done in wood work (Actually we have made two rotors)

The project that I focused on in the lab was Microfluidics

Proposed different approaches of Microfluidics chip fabrication other than typical PDMS, the alternatives are both low cost and easy to fabricate, Among ordinary methodologies, fabrication of PlexiGlass with Laser Cutter, molding with Agar and molded Silicone Oil with Laser cut PlexiGlass mask have been observed and also fully designed chip with PlexiGlass and Ethanol bonding and finally two sided silicone with Plexiglas covers has been tested
